overview_of_class: The course is a journey through the modern city. While exploring some of the most representative Italian cities, students will investigate the relationship between urban and human space and reflect on the multiple significations and complexities of the city as place, representation, perception, dream, image, memory, desire, etc. They will read and discuss poetry and prose by Montale, Caproni, Pavese, Saba, Ortese, and Calvino among others.
name: Voyage to Italy
title: WCAS ITALIAN 205-0-20 Voyage to Italy
